title: Concurrency Control
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
Managing multiple transactions running at once. 
**Serializable Schedule**: Result is same as if they ran sequentially. 
Problems: Dirty Read, Lost Update, Phantom Read.

examples.code:
Lost Update:
T1 reads X=10.
T2 reads X=10.
T1 writes 11.
T2 writes 12.
T1's update is lost.
